description: This file defines interfaces and concrete implementations for payment providers, including mock and real providers such as Stripe and Razorpay. It also provides a function to select the appropriate provider based on settings.

classes.name: PaymentProvider
classes.description: A Protocol defining the interface for payment providers with methods to create payment sessions and verify webhooks.

classes.name: MockProvider
classes.description: A mock implementation of PaymentProvider for testing purposes.

classes.name: StripeProvider
classes.description: A concrete implementation of PaymentProvider for Stripe, with placeholders for Stripe SDK integration.

classes.name: RazorpayProvider
classes.description: A concrete implementation of PaymentProvider for Razorpay.

methods.name: PaymentProvider get_payment_provider()
methods.description: Returns the active PaymentProvider instance based on configuration settings.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_session(self, user_id: str, book_id: str, amount_cents: int, currency: str)
Dict[str,Any] verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, headers: Dict[str, str])
